00021 class In;
00022 class Like;

00025 class FieldType {
00026     string _name, _type, _table;
00027 
00028 protected:
00029     typedef vector< pair<string, string> > Values;
00030 private:
00031     Values _values;
00032 public:
00033 
00034     FieldType(const string& n, 
00035               const string& t, 
00036               const string& tbl,
00037               const Values& vals = Values())
00038         : _name(n), _type(t), _table(tbl), _values(vals) {}
00039     string fullName() const { return  table() + "." + name(); }
00040     string name() const { return _name; }
00041     string type() const { return _type; }
00042     string table() const { return _table; }
00043     vector< pair<string, string> > values() { return _values; }
00045     In in(const string& set) const;
00047     In in(const SelectQuery& sel) const;
00049     Like like(const string& s);
00050     bool operator==(const FieldType & fd) const {
00051         return fd.fullName() == fullName();
00052     }
00053     bool operator!=(const FieldType & fd) const {
00054         return ! (*this == fd);
00055     }
00056 };
00057 
00059 template <class From, class To>
00060 To convert(From value);
00061 
00063 template <class T>
00064 std::string store(const T& value) {
00065     return litesql::toString(value);
00066 }
00067 
00068 template <class T>
00069 T load(const std::string& value) {
00070     return convert<const std::string&, T>(value);
00071 }
00073 template <class T>
00074 class Field {
00075     const FieldType * field; 
00076     bool _modified;
00077     T _value;
00078 public:
00079     Field(const FieldType & f) : field(&f), _modified(true) {}
00080     string fullName() const { return field->fullName(); }   
00081     string name() const { return field->name(); }
00082     string type() const { return field->type(); }
00083     string table() const { return field->table(); }
00084     T value() const { return _value; }
00085     const FieldType & fieldType() const { return *field; } 
00086     bool modified() const { return _modified; }
00087     void setModified(bool state) { _modified = state; }
00088     const Field & operator=(const string& v) { 
00089         _value = convert<const string&, T>(v);
00090         _modified = true;
00091         return *this;
00092     }
00093     const Field & operator=(const T& v) {
00094         _value = v;
00095         _modified = true;
00096         return *this;
00097     }
00098     template <class T2>
00099     const Field & operator=(T2 v) { 
00100         _modified = true;
00101         _value = litesql::convert<T2, T>(v); 
00102         return *this;
00103     }
00104     template <class T2>
00105     bool operator==(const T2& v) const {
00106         return litesql::toString(_value) == litesql::toString(v);
00107     }
00108     template <class T2>
00109     bool operator!=(const T2& v) const { return !(*this == v); }
00110     
00111 
00112     operator string() const { return toString(value()); }
00113 
00114     operator T() const { return value(); }
00115 };
00116 
00117 template <>
00118 class Field<string> {
00119     const FieldType * field; 
00120     bool _modified;
00121     string _value;
00122 public:
00123     Field(const FieldType & f) : field(&f), _modified(true) {}
00124     string fullName() const { return field->fullName(); }   
00125     string name() const { return field->name(); }
00126     string type() const { return field->type(); }
00127     string table() const { return field->table(); }
00128     string value() const { return _value; }
00129     const FieldType & fieldType() const { return *field; } 
00130     bool modified() const { return _modified; }
00131     void setModified(bool state) { _modified = state; }
00132     const Field & operator=(string v) { 
00133         _value = v;
00134         _modified = true;
00135         return *this;
00136     }
00137     const Field& operator=(const char * v) {
00138         _value = v;
00139         _modified = true;
00140         return *this;
00141     }
00142     template <class T2>
00143     const Field & operator=(T2 v) { 
00144         _modified = true;
00145         _value = litesql::convert<T2, string>(v); 
00146         return *this;
00147     }
00148     template <class T2>
00149     bool operator==(const T2& v) const {
00150         return litesql::toString(_value) == litesql::toString(v);
00151     }
00152     template <class T2>
00153     bool operator!=(const T2& v) const { return !(*this == v); }
00154 
00155     operator string() const { return value(); }
00156 };

00159 template <class T>
00160 std::string operator+(std::string a, litesql::Field<T> f) {
00161     return a + std::string(f);
00162 }
00163 template <class T>
00164 std::string operator+(litesql::Field<T> f, std::string a) {
00165     return std::string(f) + a;    
00166 }
00167 template <class T>
00168 std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & os, const litesql::Field<T> & f) {
00169     return os << f.value();
00170 }
